segments.text: Let ’ s go to the seashore on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes ! Let ’ s go sailing and water skiing . That ’ s so exciting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s expensive , too . Let ’ s just sit in the sun and go swimming instead .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Let ’ s sleep on the sand . That ’ s most exciting !
segments.speaker: S2
